title: Bug 109718 - Tips show the content of a large text item in one line
description:
When a large content is entered in a text item and the mouse pointer is placed over the text item, the tips are displayed in one line instead of the expected format. It is necessary for the tips to show the content in the given format.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Insert a text in the layout with the following content: 'Contents1. MINOR ENHANCEMENTS 32.1 PROVIDE PROPERTY GROUP INFORMATION ON ELEMENTDEFN CLASS 32.2 COMPLETE THE TODO TASKS 32.3 REVIEW RESULT 32.4 MESSAGE FILE ENHANCEMENT 4 CURRENTLY WE STORE THE ERROR MESSAGE FOR EXCEPTIONS IN THE MESSAGE.PROPERTY FILE. NEW FEATURES 53.1 RHINO EXPRESSION PARSER 53.2 STRUCTURE TYPE SUPPORT 63.3 NEW SYSTEM 64. QA TEST SUPPORTING 7'
2. Place the mouse pointer over the text item.

Expected Result: The tips should show the content in the given format.
Actual Result: The tips show the content in one line.
OB: The tips should match the given format and display the content as expected.
EB: The parameter for the element name and property name should be provided when displaying the tips.
SR: Check the code implementation to ensure the parameter for the element name and property name is properly provided when displaying the tips.
